inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of a hemolytic disorder including spherocytosis, G6PD deficiency
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with cholelithiasis or bile sludge
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 4 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to consent to and participate in the study and follow study procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of hemolytic crisis at the time of research enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with highly symptomatic gallstones who have planned surgical intervention
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has cholelithiasis and bile sludge, but has planned surgical intervention. Overall assessment is likely eligible due to the presence of cholelithiasis or bile sludge.
